code: import React from"react";import{PencilAltIcon,XCircleIcon}from"@heroicons/react/solid";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import HallService from"../../services/HallService";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HallsRow=_ref=>{let{hall}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const handleUpdate=()=>{navigate("/admin/update-hall",{state:{hall}});};const handleDelete=()=>{HallService.delete(hall.id);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"border-b text-sm text-gray-800",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 text-center",children:hall.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 text-center",children:hall.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 text-center",children:hall.capacity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 text-center",children:hall.type}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{className:"px-4 py-3 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUpdate,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PencilAltIcon,{className:"w-5 h-5"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDelete,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XCircleIcon,{className:"mr-5 w-5 h-5"})})]})]});};export default HallsRow;
